Package com.barryholroyd.bluetoothchattechdemo.bluetooth

Package to encapsulate most of the Bluetooth-specific functionality.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BluetoothBroadcastReceivers
    Register and unregister Broadcast Receivers for Bluetooth events.
    BluetoothBroadcastReceivers.Log
    Bluetooth Broadcast Receiver logging.
    BluetoothDevices
    Class which provides access to a list of Bluetooth devices.
    BluetoothUtils
    Static methods for managing Bluetooth activities.

Package com.barryholroyd.bluetoothchattechdemo.bluetooth Description

Package to encapsulate most of the Bluetooth-specific functionality.

This implementation is based on Bluetooth 3.0 ("Classic") since that is still in use (as of this time, 2016/2017) by older devices.
